title: The Ingenious Escape of Chhatrapati Shivaji from Agra

chapters.title: Imprisonment in Agra
chapters.description: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj is detained by Emperor Aurangzeb at his court in Agra under false pretenses.

chapters.title: The Deceptive Strategy
chapters.description: Shivaji devises a clever plan to feign illness and gain the trust of his captors.

chapters.title: The Crates of Sweetmeats
chapters.description: Shivaji and his son escape hidden inside large crates, purportedly carrying sweets for charity.

chapters.title: A Triumphant Return
chapters.description: Shivaji successfully evades pursuit, making his way back to his kingdom and regaining control.
